subject: Dear Sir
body:
Dear Sir
I write to you as regards to the fund project transaction that runs to the tune of $50 million which
needs your urgent attention as to accommodate it in your receiving custody, I would want to know your
capability in receiving and accommodating such large amount of fund in your country for investment
purposes
I wait to hear from you.
Thank you,
Mr Davis Smith
Financial Consultant

subject: Re:   Dear Sir
body:
Dear Mr. Davis Smith,

Thank you for your email and the opportunity to be involved in this project. I am capable of receiving such a large amount of funds in my country for investment purposes.

However, before we proceed, I would like to know more details about this project. What kind of investment are we talking about? And what will be my role in it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Raymond
